name: insulations
description: A modern, responsive website for an insulation services provider based in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA). This site showcases services, company values, and contact information for potential clients.

scripts.create-dirs: mkdir dist && mkdir dist\css && mkdir dist\js
scripts.build:html: html-minifier index.html -o dist/index.html --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && html-minifier blog.html -o dist/blog.html --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace
scripts.build:js: terser js/main.js -o dist/js/main.js -c -m && terser js/blog.js -o dist/js/blog.js -c -m && terser js/post.js -o dist/js/post.js -c -m && terser js/effects.js -o dist/js/effects.js -c -m
scripts.copy:assets: xcopy imgs dist\imgs /S /I /Y && xcopy favicon dist\favicon /S /I /Y && xcopy data dist\data /S /I /Y && xcopy public dist\public /S /I /Y
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:assets && npm run build:posts
